faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Nano Banana2
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: What is Nano Banana2?
items.answer: Nano Banana2 is an advanced AI image generation platform powered by Google's Gemini models.

items.question: Do I need design skills to use Nano Banana2?
items.answer: No, Nano Banana2 is designed for everyone. Just describe what you want to see, and our AI will create it for you.

items.question: What resolutions are supported?
items.answer: We support 1K, 2K, and 4K high-resolution output to meet your various needs.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans. You can check our pricing page for more details.

items.question: Can I use the images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, you own the rights to the images you generate with Nano Banana2.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply sign up for an account, choose a plan, and start generating images immediately.
